Package dat.backend.model.persistence

Class MaterialFacade

java.lang.Object
dat.backend.model.persistence.MaterialFacade
public class MaterialFacade extends Object
This class functions as a facade for MaterialMapper.java for the sake of simplicity. The MaterialMapper class contains all the methods used to retrieve and alter materials from the database. All methods in this class is static.
Author:
MrJustMeDahl
